medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal discomfort localized to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 48 hours ago with constipation, 24 hours of anorexia, and 12 hours of abdominal discomfort. The discomfort has since localized to the right lower quadrant. The patient denies fevers, nausea, and vomiting. Last bowel movement was before admission, patient reports passing flatus this morning. No previous episodes of similar pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hemorrhoids; past surgical history includes hemorrhoidectomy and tonsillectomy.
